website_summaries.verdict: Massage ball roller is specifically designed without foam to trigger deeper tissue regions in need of muscle tension release.
pros: Intense vibration targets deeper areas of muscle tissue
Choice of four modes to align with specific needs
cons: Use high-intensity vibration with caution, especially on chest or neck

customer_reviews.title: Very effective for release
customer_reviews.text: This peanut shaped vibrating roller is a life saver! It definitely does a better job of myofascial release than the foam rollers. The vibrations are not evenly distributed though - the motor is housed on the same side as the on/off button and the vibrations are stronger there than the other side of the peanut. But given the benefits I am getting from it I really don't mind.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Massage Roller
customer_reviews.text: I love this massager! It has four different settings which each work great for different parts of my body depending on how much intensity I need per location. I fully charged it when it arrived and haven’t had to recharge since despite using it every day. Awesome for getting deeper massages that a regular roller just can’t do!
customer_reviews.author: Rikka

customer_reviews.title: Great product for fitness and pain relief
customer_reviews.text: As a former DI scholarship athlete who still trains hard this product is invaluable for my overall fitness. I have used many myofascial release products to warm-up and recover. This product looses my muscles up better than foam rolling, using the stick, a lacrosse or tennis ball. Using this product has increased my mobility and flexibility. My wife is a former aerobics instructor who still takes HIT training classes throughout the week. She had been in pain for many months prior to us buying this product. After the first time of using the product it decreases her hip pain and she now uses it after her workouts to be pain free.
customer_reviews.author: Stafford

customer_reviews.title: Amazing depth and power- totally hit my lower back issues- buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I like foam rollers and even the tennis ball trick. But this vibrating roller is Amazing!! I love it and it’s great for hitting all the deep pressure points you really can’t get (but try to!) with the other modes of muscle massaging and lengthening. It is extremely powerful- truly unlike anything I’ve used before. I’ve only used level 1 & 2 so far. My favorite thing about this product is how comfortably designed it is and rolls with ease against the areas I always need targeted- especially lower back and glutes. What a great find- def recommending this to anyone thinking of buying.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmers22

customer_reviews.title: Best for t-spine stiffness
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic. I’ve purchased nearly every “peanut” style mobility product on the market and this is my new favorite. Previously it was the “Gemini” by mobility wod. This roller is a slightly bigger diameter (better) and is just as hard as the Gemini, and vibrates with the intensity of a hitachi magic wand. Buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Firm roller, strong vibration
customer_reviews.text: Good rubbery texture so it doesn’t slide around, very firm and strong enough vibrations to get into tight trigger points
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Pretty awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was exactly as expected. The product itself lived up to the hype! If you thought the foam rollers after a workout were amazing, wait until you try this!! It takes your post workout routine to a whole new level!! I’m very satisfied with my new baby, totally worth it!! :)
customer_reviews.author: alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this to anybody with Muscle or joint pain
customer_reviews.text: Wow!! I’ve never found a muscle relaxer that’s worked this WELL. I’ve had constant muscle spasms and pain for I’d say a little over a year now. I’ve been given pills by a number of doctors and seen ohh sooo many PT. The 4 various modes I find very helpful when needing to reach lower back areas.
customer_reviews.author: Tair Barth

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Was using lacrosse balls and was looking for essentially two lacrosse balls together, then saw this that also had the massaging/vibrating feature. Works great!!
customer_reviews.author: Just another dad

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I work 10-14 hours a day, I really like how this roller vibrates in different speeds. Helps my muscles and my body loosen up after a long day. Also its travel size, so I can take it anywhere I go.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Osborn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome! It alleviates pain and soreness using multiple levels of vibration. 100% recommended to family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Parks

customer_reviews.title: This is the best!
customer_reviews.text: This massage ball roller is great, it has so many different speed settings and it’s definitely great at getting those kinks out. Great for someone who goes to the gym often!
customer_reviews.author: baby peach

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping and really great product. Perfect for sore back muscles!
customer_reviews.author: Rad

customer_reviews.title: Vibrations help hit the muscle early
customer_reviews.text: The product worked to roll out the muscles very well as expected. The vibration is what really surprised me. I usually use a standard foam roller to roll out my legs but decided to give this a try. I found that the vibrations helped to release the tension in the muscle a lot earlier than a standard roller. It would start working on my problem points by shaking them out before fully utilizing my body weight. I also found this to be very helpful for releasing stress in my upper back and shoulders after a long day at the office staring at my computer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and convenient!
customer_reviews.text: I love this and use it several times a week on my super tight shoulders and neck. It has been a lifesaver for me as I have chronic back/shoulder/neck pain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Addict

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Strong Vibration.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is heavy, sturdy, vibrates soft or hard, steady or pulse and holds a charge for a long time. I'm the type of guy that works out pain after it's too late... So this thing has brought me great relief. Maybe some day I'll smarten up and use it for preventive maintenance.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Dombrowski

customer_reviews.title: Very well rounded product
customer_reviews.text: This machine packs a big punch in a small package. Very easy to handle, feels very ergonomic in your hands. Nice material, very easy to clean. For the massages the 4 different settings really makes it convenient for you to find the right speed. Lastly the battery on this last quite awhile before you have to charge it again so you can take it to any room of the house and enjoy a relaxing massage.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome Hipolito

product_meta.title: Vibrating Back Roller Massage Ball with Double Trigger Point Balls and Powerful Lithium-Ion Batteries for Deep Tissue Release by Miracle Vibration
product_meta.description:
Color:Black

WARNING: This is one of the strongest vibrating back roller massage fitness tools ever made. It will make your voice quiver and vision blurred if used on chest or neck. 

Deep Intensity Use this vibrating back roller massage ball roller to soothe deep muscles and shaped to target pressure points. Feel a reduction in muscle stiffness and soreness while improving circulation and oxygenation of muscles for a faster recovery post-exercise. Provides myofascial release to significantly reduce pain. 

Extremely intense and LONG LASTING rechargeable lithium-ion batteries. 

 Lengthen and Stretch your Muscles Pre-Workout Prepare your muscles for any sports activity or physical therapy to reduce tightness, pain and muscle fatigue. 

Melt your muscle tightness away with the gift of Miracle Vibrations phenomenal power for trigger point deep tissue massage. Miracle Vibration massage ball heals the deeper trigger point muscles with miraculously powerful vibrations. -

 

4 Levels of penetrating strength to maximize blood circulation and to heal by maximizing blood -

 4 Speed Powerful Vibration Intensities and auto mode so you can choose the perfect intensity to fit your need. The Miracle Vibration Massage Ball Roller was specifically designed without any foam to increase maximum vibration intensity to penetrate the trigger point deep tissue muscle tightness you need to release. 

 -

 Improved Spinal Cord Fluidity and Blood Flow Oxygenation from trigger point deep tissue rejuvenation is strongly believed to improve Brain Function. 

 -

 Long Lasting Rechargeable Extremely Intense Lithium-Ion Batteryconveniently turns off after 10 minutes of use. LED Indicator lights display intensity level.
feature_bullets: -Created to penetrate deep inside tight muscle tissue that most massage therapists do not have the time or strength to dig into. Heal and recover trigger point muscle tightness with intense vibrations to release difficult knots and trigger pressure points. Reduces muscle stiffness and soreness, while improving circulation and oxygenation of muscles for a faster recovery post-exercise. Provides myofascial release to significantly reduce pain.

-The miracle vibration back roller massage ball roller vibrates with such incredible lithium-ion intensity it gets deeper blood flow and reduces more tension than a traditional foam roller. Prepare your muscles to lengthen, stretch and reduce pain and muscle fatigue.
-4-Speed Vibration Intensities and auto mode. Use higher vibration intensities and deep pressure to increase blood flow and clear out toxins deep into the muscle/fascia.

-Brain Health & Vitality Booster with increased venous return. Increased blood circulation removes toxins from the muscles and increases oxygen and nutrients in your blood to be delivered to your muscles, organs and brain.
-Long Lasting Rechargeable Lithium Ion Battery conveniently turns off after 10 minutes of use. LED Indicator lights display intensity level.
